Articles.Content:
Ok, It is with humans, but they behave like Kerbals.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086197/

Go watch this movie, you won't be sorry.

I thought you were going to post The Europa Report, which really reminds me of KSP. Some of the lander parts even look like KSP radial engines :-)

But yes, I love the way those test pilots pushed the limits. I think Interstellar catches that quite well, too.
It's a great movie, but it's not actually about KSP. And so, moved to Space Lounge.
I read the book, and it's absolutely amazing. However, I'd need my parents' consent to watch the movie.
